column1: The Pit Room////Moist brisket and pork ribs were good
column2: but not amazing. Frito pie was very salty
column4: charro beans were not good. Guys preparing your food are not very friendly either. Limited seating because they don't clean up after other guests leave
column5: but thankfully we were able to find one open table at The Patio. To top it all off
column6: they overcharged me and added a lb of brisket on my tab when we never ordered it nor received it. Watch out!! You will probably have better BBQ at your friend's house. Don't waste your time.
